title: mute pings
body: plz for the love of god add this feature. the amount f trolls abusing this thing. PING PING PING PING PING PING. PLZ. although pings are good sometimes they are just SO annoying to deal with when they r excessively used over and over in the space of half a second.

replies.body: yeah you can mute altogether pings but if you mute singular pings everyone else wouldve been alerted to something but you might not have been because you got him muted, so everyone will know what to do, or be prepared except you. this is of course the argument that sometime during the game all trolls will in fact make an important or just non-troll-y ping. its not a good system but its the least of my problems to do with league trolls

U can mute pings:
 
u can:

1) Mute ur cpu
2) Go to main menu (in-game) then click 'Sound'.
     After you should see 'Pings' click the pings to nil (zero)

It can also be done for everything, meaning ur able to listen ur music more easily!
That's wat i do :P
